attributes.action: Replace all Car and Road Taxes with added Tax On Fuel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By removing all current forms of road tax and replacing them with an additional tax on fuel, you are affectively achieving a fair pay as you go scheme.  Although this does not deal with reducing congestion on particular roads it allows a fair tax for those that use their car infrequently and for those that use it a lot.  It also ties in tax to the efficiency of a car, which may be an aid to cutting pollution.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
